go_data.justification: Cdc48p is described as an ATPase complex, indicating it has ATP hydrolysis activity.
Cdc48p is mentioned as part of the ERAD pathway, which is involved in the catabolic process of proteins associated with the endoplasmic reticulum.
Although not explicitly stated for Cdc48, its involvement in ERAD and interaction with other ER-associated proteins implies a cytosolic location for its function.
